text: to (ai rasool) tum baatil se katara ke apana rukh deen kee taraph kie raho yahee khuda kee banaavat hai jis par usane logon ko paida kiya hai khuda kee (durust kee huee) banaavat mein tagayyur tabaddul (ulat pher) nahin ho sakata yahee mazaboot aur (bilkul seedha) deen hai magar bahut se log nahin jaanate hain
